body:
It's just a matter of time when artist who put effort in their releases do ntr. It's easy and they don't have to think of the "story" as the people that like it are easily appealed. Just give some good art and people to laugh at and hurt, it's a succes.

Funny how when an artist who never made an ntr makes one and suddenly cucks fly in from everywhere to "support". When in reality they don't care about the artist at all :]. All they see is ntr and good art. They couldn't care less who makes it aslong as they get their fix. Defective people are everywhere sadly...
